articles.title: Fossils reveal dinosaurs were thriving in North America just before being wiped out by asteroid strike, study shows - CBS News
articles.description: Scientists have long debated whether dinosaurs were in decline before an asteroid smacked the Earth 66 million years ago, causing mass extinction.
articles.content:
Scientists have long debated whether dinosaurs were in decline before an asteroid smacked the Earth 66 million years ago, causing mass extinction.
